src:
Microsoft introduces Azure Quantum, a full-stack, open cloud ecosystem for quantum computing
04 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Pradeep



At Ignite 2019, Microsoft today announced Azure Quantum, a full-stack, open cloud ecosystem that will bring the benefits of quantum computing organizations. Azure Quantum is a set of quantum services that includes pre-built Quantum solutions, Quantum software and quantum hardware. Microsoft is partnering with 1QBit, Honeywell, IonQ, and QCI to offer a wide variety of quantum solutions, software, and hardware across the industry.
With one program, you’ll be able to target a variety of hardware through Azure Quantum – Azure classical compute, quantum simulators and resource estimators, and quantum hardware from our partners, as well as our future quantum system being built on revolutionary topological qubit.





You can learn more about Azure Quantum from the link below.
Source: Microsoft
